you could be experiencing a 'master brow: on a SMB/CIFS network, the 'master browser' keeps a list of all available shares. Clients query  the master browser for said list of shares. For more in depth coverage, take a look at the samba documentation (http://us4.samba.org/samba/docs/man/Samba-HOWTO-Collection/NetworkBrowsing.html#id2549105)
But the shares are on a windows share not Samba they have a win2k sevrer and shared some folders the other windows boxes just map a drive to their particualr folder
